title: Ashampoo Slideshow Studio HD v2.0.6 + Patch.rar
description:
Includes the Ashampoo Slideshow Studio HD v2.0.6 installation package, a patch and a text file containing instructions.

Install as usual. After installation use the provided patch. No serial number required. Done! Enjoy!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Get Ashampoo Slideshow Studio HD, import your pictures and create a digital slideshow in no time. Choose from a number of amazing effects, comment by adding text and add background music.


FEATURES:

-Picture transitions, opening and end credits, background music, subtitles etc.
-Freely definable effects, panning and zooming (Ken Burns).
-Slideshows in HD quality (720p and 1080p).
-Output formats: MPEG-1,-2,-4, Facebook compatible format etc.
-Burn directly to DVD or Blu-ray.
-Upload to YouTube.
